title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty — Episode 28
description: The shadow of war looms over Kepler, West Virginia. A troubled Pine Guard must race to thwart a hundred insidious plans, all of which appear to be reaching toward a single, horrific conclusion. Duck opens the way. Aubrey takes a deadly risk. Ned writes his confession.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
